song.title: Great is your mercy
song.lyrics:
[C] Great is your mercy, wonderful your love! Great is your mercy, infinite your love! God of compassion, I will never cease to sing your praise!
[V1] You, o Lord, are a merciful God, Your compassion is true. Slow to anger and faithful in love, You seek for the lost to save them from sin.
[V2] All the poor fix their eyes upon you. You give hope in despair. To the needy, you open your hands. You fill them, o Lord, with life to the full.
[V3] All my heart offers thanks to my God, Worships his holy name. I will tell of his marvellous deeds, A new song of praise each day of my life.
